scripts.asbuild:debug: mkdir -p build && asc assembly/index.ts --target debug --exportMemory --outFile build/debug.wasm && mkdir -p public && cp build/debug.wasm public/debug.wasm
scripts.asbuild:release: mkdir -p build && asc assembly/index.ts --target release --exportMemory --outFile build/release.wasm && mkdir -p public && cp build/release.wasm public/release.wasm
scripts.build:all: npm run asbuild:release && npm run build
